column1: The Purple Pig////-Ricotta stuffed gnocchi w/ rabbit ragu & nettle pesto: Gnocchi is always a hit or miss dish for me but for the first time this is somewhere in the middle. I would've loved a different textural element because the whole dish was just kind of soft. However the flavors for the most part were excellent. The creamy
column2: light ricotta paired very well with the slightly gamey rabbit ragu and the nettle pesto gave everything a delicious tanginess. That being said I did find the ragu just a bit too salty and I would've loved a bit more of the pesto (3.5/5)
